errors.error_description: The `git clone` command uses an incorrect URL (`openreview_py.git` with an underscore instead of a hyphen), which will cause the clone operation to fail because the repository does not exist at that URL.

The example usage code shows literal strings 'username' and 'password' instead of placeholders, which could mislead a user into trying to connect with these incorrect credentials, causing an authentication failure.
correction_candidates: username='... your username ...', password='... your password ...'

// Replace with your OpenReview credentials
client = openreview.Client(baseurl='https://api.openreview.net', username='<your username>', password='<your password>')
